00132 
00136    template <typename Data, int Capacity>
00137    inline FPArray<Data, Capacity>::FPArray()
00138     : size_(0)
00139    {}
00140 
00141    /*
00142    * Copy constructor, copy all pointers.
00143    */
00144    template<typename Data, int Capacity>
00145    FPArray<Data, Capacity>::FPArray(const FPArray<Data, Capacity>& other) 
00146    {
00147 
00148       // Copy pointer values
00149       int i;
00150       for (i = 0; i < other.size_; ++i) {
00151          ptrs_[i] = other.ptrs_[i];
00152       }
00153       size_ = other.size_;
00154 
00155       // Nullify any unused elements
00156       if (Capacity > size_) {
00157          for (i = size_; i < Capacity; ++i) {
00158             ptrs_[i] = 0;
00159          }
00160       }
00161 
00162    }
00163 
00164    /*
00165    * Assignment, element by element.
00166    */
00167    template <typename Data, int Capacity>
00168    FPArray<Data, Capacity>& 
00169    FPArray<Data, Capacity>::operator=(const FPArray<Data, Capacity>& other) 
00170    {
00171 
00172       // Check for self assignment
00173       if (this == &other) return *this;
00174 
00175       // Precondition
00176       if (Capacity < other.size_) {
00177          UTIL_THROW("LHS FPArray is too small");
00178       }
00179 
00180       // Copy pointers
00181       for (int i = 0; i < other.size_; ++i) {
00182          ptrs_[i] = other[i];
00183       }
00184       size_ = other.size_;
00185 
00186       // Nullify any unused elements
00187       if (Capacity > size_) {
00188          for (int i = size_; i < Capacity; ++i) {
00189             ptrs_[i] = 0;
00190          }
00191       }
00192 
00193       return *this;
00194    }

00200    inline FPArray<Data, Capacity>::~FPArray()
00201    {}

00206    template <typename Data, int Capacity>
00207    inline int FPArray<Data, Capacity>::capacity() const
00208    { return Capacity; }

00210    /*
00211    * Return logical size of this array.
00212    */
00213    template <typename Data, int Capacity>
00214    inline int FPArray<Data, Capacity>::size() const
00215    { return size_; }

00217    /*
00218    * Set a PArrayIterator to the beginning of this Array.
00219    */
00220    template <typename Data, int Capacity>
00221    inline 
00222    void FPArray<Data, Capacity>::begin(PArrayIterator<Data> &iterator)
00223    {
00224       iterator.setCurrent(const_cast<Data**>(ptrs_));
00225       iterator.setEnd(const_cast<Data**>(ptrs_ + size_));
00226    }
00227 
00228    /*
00229    * Set a PArrayIterator to the beginning of this Array.
00230    */
00231    template <typename Data, int Capacity>
00232    inline 
00233    void FPArray<Data, Capacity>::begin(ConstPArrayIterator<Data> &iterator) const
00234    {
00235       iterator.setCurrent(const_cast<Data**>(ptrs_));
00236       iterator.setEnd(const_cast<Data**>(ptrs_ + size_));
00237    }

00239    /*
00240    * Mimic C array subscripting.
00241    *
00242    * \param  i array index
00243    * \return reference to element i
00244    */
00245    template <typename Data, int Capacity>
00246    inline Data& FPArray<Data, Capacity>::operator[] (int i)
00247    {
00248       assert(i < size_);
00249       assert(i >= 0);
00250       return *ptrs_[i];
00251    }
00252 
00253    /*
00254    * Mimic C array subscripting.
00255    *
00256    * \param i array index
00257    * \return const reference to element i
00258    */
00259    template <typename Data, int Capacity>
00260    inline const Data& FPArray<Data, Capacity>::operator[] (int i) const
00261    {
00262       assert(i < size_);
00263       assert(i >= 0 );
00264       return *ptrs_[i];
00265    }
00266 
00267    /*
00268    * Append data to the end of the array.
00269    *
00270    * \param data Data to add to end of array.
00271    */
00272    template <typename Data, int Capacity>
00273    inline void FPArray<Data, Capacity>::append(Data &data) 
00274    {
00275       if (size_ == Capacity) {
00276          UTIL_THROW("Attempt to add to full FPArray");
00277       }
00278       ptrs_[size_] = &data;
00279       ++size_;
00280    }
00281 
00282    /*
00283    * Set logical size to zero.
00284    */
00285    template <typename Data, int Capacity>
00286    inline void FPArray<Data, Capacity>::clear() 
00287    { 
00288       size_ = 0; 
00289       for (int i=0; i < Capacity; ++i) {
00290          ptrs_[i] = 0;
00291       }
00292    }
